idea:
Fast and friendly, we offer professional services throughout the Mumbai area. Our team of 10 pros is up for any job, from big to small. Mumbai locals know that we stand behind our work, putting your satisfaction as our #1 priority. What really makes us stand out is our dedication, great prices and attention to detail. Contact us to learn more from one of our expert staff on how our professional team can help you!


Looking for a top-notch Cab Service? Allow us to introduce ourselves. We're Faer and our team of pros are available whenever you need us. We don't just meet your expectations, we surpass them. Faer serves the needs of residents in Mumbai and the surrounding area. Since 2021, our company has been committed to being the best at what we do.
name: FAER PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: KHYATI HEALTHCARE PRIVATE LIMITED  has a vision to ensure medicines are affordable while being of the most premium quality, we aim to reach every corner of the world. Our future plans involve developing, manufacturing and selling a wide range of generic products at realistic prices This way we dream to make a substantial contribution to the reduction of costs in public health system! We offer Tablets & Capsules 12 ,Liquids Orals , Injectables & Eye/Ear Drops ,Cosmetics O,Ointments & Creams Herbals.
name: KHYATI HEALTHCARE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: At G G MARINE CONTAINERS PRIVATE LIMITED ,our ambition is to use technology to simplify the logistics of global trade, making the processes around the container as simple as the container itself. We do that by providing a neutral infrastructure that connects all logistics companies to remove friction and create economic opportunity.
name: G G MARINE CONTAINERS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Fitness outlets listing site with a billing software support for the outlet owners
name: FitNxt

idea:
The status quo around networking is as old as manâ€™s quest to develop communities. While technology is constantly evolving to make it easy to connect with strangers, it lacks within it an inherent incentive to do so. It is why all popular digital connectivity platforms lean towards connecting you with friends, colleagues and contacts you already know.


Networking events built around common interests, common experiences do bring strangers together. However, few connections are formed and fewer last towards an impactful long term exchange of support. Vishal and Mohit met at one such event exploring their interest in design and marketing. While they found common ground, their journey from networking to partnering involved years of passive connectivity and build up of trust. They saw an opening in the networking industry. They realised the extreme lack of incentive for people to help beyond their existing circles. SPRECT - Super Connect was, thus, born to accelerate and incentivise global connectivity.
name: SPRECT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Our motto at WatsUniq is to provide a digital platform where every local entrepreneur can dream to deliver their trailblazing innovative sustainable products using our go-to market strategies, alongside supporting the local brands and products made available to the customers, with just a click away.


We are the only online platform who will promote & sell GREEN, Energy Efficient, Eco-Friendly Furniture and appliances and contribute towards the Sustainable future.
name: WatsUniq

idea: Masala Threads enables Western brands to have a completely ethical/sustainable supply chain from A-Z. name: Masala Threads Ltd

idea: Steelink India is engaged into manufacturing, supplying and exporting the best quality of Scaffolding Equipment, Formwork accessories for various industrial, residential and infrastructure projects.
